name: *Limited Edition* Rejuvenation
description:
These are beads I have had in my collection for years. They are a complex, iridescent, bright green glass. I have enough supply to make 6 with no ability to restock - hence the Limited Edition. If it is still advertised I still have stock. The color and the design makes me think of a hammock strung between 2 palm trees. Imagine a fruity drink and the sound of waves while you relax and rejuvenate.  

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the piece a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

The limbs and trunk are constructed using a gold plated copper wire. The gold plating is a soft yellow that compliments both the silver and bronze forms while allowing the beauty of the tree to stand out. 

All materials are tarnish resistant to keep the piece looking new. 

Please keep in mind that each tree is unique and has a life of its own. I will try my best to match them to the displayed image but since they are all hand worked and will inevitably vary.

name: Passionate Pursuit
description:
The bold red, yellow and orange of the Carnelian gemstones inspire passion and love. Perfect for the person looking for energy and inspiration to pursue their dreams.

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the piece a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

The limbs and trunk are constructed using a gold plated copper wire. The gold plating is a soft yellow that compliments both the silver and bronze forms while allowing the beauty of the tree to stand out. 

All materials are tarnish resistant to keep the piece looking new. 

Please keep in mind that each tree is unique and has a life of its own. I will try my best to match them to the displayed image but since they are all hand worked and have rough cut gemstones they will inevitably vary.

name: New Beginnings
description:
This is my signature tree. The Olive Jade gemstone chips have sharper angles that create a very "leaf-like" texture. The lively green inspires thoughts of springtime and the new life that comes after a winter freeze.

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the pieces a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

The limbs and trunk are constructed using a gold plated copper wire. The gold plating is a soft yellow that compliments both the silver and bronze forms while allowing the beauty of the tree to stand out.

Please keep in mind that each tree is unique and has a life of its own. I will try my best to match them to the displayed image but since they are all hand worked and have rough cut gemstones they will inevitably vary.

name: Daytime Dreamer
description:
The delicate cream, gold and clear of the Citrine gemstones give this piece a feeling of whimsy. When the sun hits this beautiful tree it reflects just the right amount of light to catch your eye.  Inspires thoughts of warmth and dreams for tomorrow.

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the piece a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

name: Standing Strong
description:
The solid feel of the Green Jasper gemstone inspires tranquility and strength. It is a beautiful mellow green with white mineral deposits that add a lovely complexity to the stones.

name: Soothing Spirit
description:
Green Prehnite is an elegant, mint green gemstone. There is an added level of complexity with the interspersed deep green flecks. This tree is soothing and calm.

name: Tranquil Silence
description:
Labradorite gemstones are a brown/grey/green color that have surprising blue highlights when the sun strikes them. It is a tough stone to accurately photograph because the highlights make the color deeper. It inspires thoughts of the tranquility under the sea. For someone looking to quiet the noises of life and focus their energy inward.

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the piece a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

name: Team Spirit
description:
This tree is made from a collection of mixed blue quartz glass beads with a vibrant blue color. The Blue and Gold color combination is perfect for my FHS Golden Eagles out there.

name: Inspire
description:
Cherry Quartz is a deep, rose pink glass bead. I make these primarily for my breast cancer sisters and other people affected by the disease. These trees inspire women undergoing treatment to stand strong and remind them of everyone who has gone before them down this path no one asks for.

The tree is constructed within a 2" hand wrapped parawire form. I have selected wire with a square cross section because I feel this gives the piece a clean contemporary look. You can choose between silver or vintage bronze plating.

The limbs and trunk are constructed using a gold plated copper wire. The gold plating is a soft yellow that compliments both the silver and bronze forms while allowing the beauty of the tree to stand out.
